column4: hi, I'm following a gvim tutorial, what it means "Goto normal mode and press \ll"??
well, there is insert mode and command/normal mode
to enter commands, you need to enter the normal mode. just press Esc key when in the insert/editing mode to enter the normal mode

sipior: rigved: Dr_Willis: thanks. In normal mode I type ":command", what it means \ll. (the tutorial is http://vim-latex.sourceforge.net/documentation/latex-suite-quickstart.html#lsq-compiling, in 8 Compiling a document)
